topics.body:
Oh wow, so I'm hearing that Jon Stewart is going to be leaving the the Daily Show like at the end of this year.

So not only is the Colbert Report going to be hosted by someone else now the Daily show is going to be hosted by someone else now. 

And the bits and pieces of my childhood continue to fall.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54df7f5f63687252cbaf0100#post_54df7f5f63687252cbaf0100
To be fair, The Daily Show is still gonna be on. Just with a different host. And Stewart has been doing the show FOREVER.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54df7fa26368720183661500#post_54df7fa26368720183661500
I know but that doesn't make it any least sad to hear. 

Especially since both of them are going to be gone now. The longer someone stays around the more attached you get to them.

Hopefully whoever takes their places is good and doesn't suck. 

Gonna miss these bros!
